title: Didnt get the win with no ranged champions. When I completed it.
body:
Can I get an explanation? Also the other players didn't get it either. 

Edit: Even tho it shows my icon as the bronze one before the game i changed it to the free worlds icon.

replies.body: It looks like your icon was just recently changed back to the Worlds icon, and there don't seem to be any matches taking place after the Worlds icon was equipped.

I changed it before I selected my role in the role selection as did my wife which was sitting right beside me.
Edit : Funny cause i went back and looked at the replay and in the loading screen it shows my worlds icon.

Iiiinteresting.....the plot thickens! I'm gonna list some times to show what I'm seeing on my end. They're going to look heckin' weird, and possibly impossible times, but it's just because they're standardized to one time zone and adjusted.

I'm currently showing that you changed the icon at 2017-10-02 23:26:48 PDT and the most recent game was played at 	2017-10-02 16:36:13 PDT. With that data, it looks like you changed the icon back to Worlds and still haven't played any games with it equipped. With that being said, the match with no ranged champions may be taking awhile to properly record. If that's the case, we'll just have to wait for that match to be uploaded for the mission to update. 


Just to be sure of everything, what game was it that you were playing that you think should have finished the mission? Tell me all the champions that were on your team, or shoot me a screenshot of the game itself so I can triple check everything, otherwise, I can only go off the data I have.

https://ibb.co/ezP1kb
https://ibb.co/dpB3yw
This is the game that we played with the loading screen. Olaf (Me), Garen (Wife), Malphite (Brothers GF) all 3 of us did not get it.
The other two we also invited to the game premade of 5.

Well snap! Thanks for those screenies, helps to validate what you're seeing on your end!

Let me know if that mission completes by tomorrow, since it seems like that match just hasn't been recorded quite yet. If it still hasn't completed we might need to poke it a bit!
Thank you sir it actually just went in as this comment came up. You may close this thread. Thank you riot employee.
do you was in a 5-premade group?  You need to have a premade group of 5 to finish this mission

> [{quoted}](name=KNTE Lukas,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=JHzs1YKM,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-10-03T10:13:30.233+0000)
>
> do you was in a 5-premade group?  You need to have a premade group of 5 to finish this mission

[{quoted}](name=Reflexiv Mexiv,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=JHzs1YKM,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2017-10-03T03:33:10.898+0000) Read the third line.

I had the same bug, my pre-made group of friends and I did not get the 5 tokens from the missions. Here is the screenshot for proof.
https://gyazo.com/2920f2bb8b18c22e8ddd787cd60ebb72
